pages.text: The $(mob)Dhampir$() is a monster that spawns above the ground in Taiga biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It is vulnerable to the $(thing)Smite$() enchantment. $(mob)Dhampir$() attack players on sight with melee attacks that apply a $(thing)Slowness$() effect. While below 25% health in combat, she will receive a bonus to movement and attack speed. During combat, a $(mob)Dhampir$() may summon $(l:grimoireofgaia_vampire)$(mob)Vampires$() to assist her.
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().
$(mob)Deathwords$() drop $(item)Book Bag$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open the bag and receive a random enchantment book.
